summary: Completed comprehensive analysis of NFL odds reversal bug. Identified three critical issues: (1) Team name parsing error in kalshi_db_manager.py causing 'England' instead of 'New England' in database, (2) ESPN matcher unable to find markets due to team name mismatch, (3) Duplicate market handling. Root cause: _extract_teams() function incorrectly extracts last word before delimiter. Created detailed technical report with code locations, evidence, and recommended fixes.

bug_locations: Database: kalshi_markets table has 'England' instead of 'New England'

evidence.database_query_result: away_team='England' for 'New England at Cincinnati' market
evidence.matcher_result: Returns None (no match found) for Patriots vs Bengals game
evidence.duplicate_markets: Two tickers per game: KXNFLGAME-25NOV23NECIN-NE (77¢) and -CIN (24¢)

critical_findings.impact: High - Kalshi odds not displaying on game cards, potential wrong betting recommendations if odds do display reversed
